alert.note: Alert for Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 10 at 2:34AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...For the north Oregon Coast and the Coast Range of Northwest Oregon. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may also occur in areas with poor drainage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rain, heavy at times, will continue into this morning. Rain will decreasing towards noon today. In generally, 1 to 4 inches of rain have fallen in past 12 hours, but another 1 to 3 inches of rain will fall this morning. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible flood warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; North Oregon Coast
